001.comments: If this section if FULL or BLOCKED please sign up for the corresponding wait list section - FIST 332, Section WL1. Once you have registered in the wait list there is no need to contact the Department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available. Preference may be given to Majors, Minors, or Honours students in Theatre or Film. For more information about Department of Theatre and Film wait lists please visit: http://theatrefilm.ubc.ca/undergraduate/undergraduate-courses/how-to-wait-list-a-course/

WL1.comments: This is a WAITLIST section for FIST 332 Section 99A. Once you have registered in the waitlist there is no need to contact the Department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available.

description: A seminar examining one or more genres or periods, such as the Western, Film Noir, Science Fiction, Films of the 1980's. Also includes study of national cinemas.
